name: OWASP Top 10 2021
description: Web application security testing based on OWASP Top 10 2021

deliverables.title: A01:2021 - Broken Access Control
deliverables.description: Test for IDOR, privilege escalation, forced browsing, and authorization bypasses
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%IDOR%' OR title LIKE '%authorization%' OR title LIKE '%access control%'

deliverables.title: A02:2021 - Cryptographic Failures
deliverables.description: Test for weak encryption, insecure storage, cleartext transmission of sensitive data
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%encryption%' OR title LIKE '%SSL%' OR title LIKE '%TLS%' OR title LIKE '%crypto%'

deliverables.title: A03:2021 - Injection
deliverables.description: Test for SQL injection, command injection, LDAP injection, XPath injection
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%injection%' OR title LIKE '%SQLi%'

deliverables.title: A04:2021 - Insecure Design
deliverables.description: Test for business logic flaws, missing security controls in design
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%business logic%' OR title LIKE '%design%'

deliverables.title: A05:2021 - Security Misconfiguration
deliverables.description: Test for default credentials, unnecessary features enabled, verbose errors
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%misconfiguration%' OR title LIKE '%default%' OR title LIKE '%information disclosure%'

deliverables.title: A06:2021 - Vulnerable and Outdated Components
deliverables.description: Identify known vulnerabilities in frameworks, libraries, and dependencies
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%CVE%' OR title LIKE '%outdated%' OR title LIKE '%vulnerable component%'

deliverables.title: A07:2021 - Identification and Authentication Failures
deliverables.description: Test for weak passwords, session fixation, credential stuffing vulnerabilities
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%authentication%' OR title LIKE '%session%' OR title LIKE '%password%'

deliverables.title: A08:2021 - Software and Data Integrity Failures
deliverables.description: Test for insecure deserialization, CI/CD pipeline security, auto-update vulnerabilities
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%deserialization%' OR title LIKE '%integrity%'

deliverables.title: A09:2021 - Security Logging and Monitoring Failures
deliverables.description: Test for insufficient logging, missing alerting, lack of audit trails

deliverables.title: A10:2021 - Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF)
deliverables.description: Test for SSRF vulnerabilities allowing access to internal resources
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%SSRF%' OR title LIKE '%request forgery%'
